installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo " IW4x Installer (GLIBC 2.39) "
echo "-----------------------------------------"

# --- System setup ---
apt-get update
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    xz-utils build-essential wget curl unzip patchelf git \
    gawk bison python3 python3-dev libc6-dev make gcc g++ pkg-config \
    gettext locales ca-certificates

locale-gen en_US.UTF-8
export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8

# --- Variables ---
GLIBC_VERSION='2.39'
GLIBC_PARENT_DIR="/mnt/server/glibc"
GLIBC_SRC_DIR="${GLIBC_PARENT_DIR}/glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}"
GLIBC_BUILD_DIR="${GLIBC_PARENT_DIR}/glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}-build"
GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR="${GLIBC_PARENT_DIR}/glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}-install"

# --- Build GLIBC (skip if already built) ---
if [ -f "${GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR}/lib/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2" ]; then
  echo "[GLIBC] Found existing GLIBC ${GLIBC_VERSION}, skipping build."
else
  echo "[GLIBC] Building GLIBC ${GLIBC_VERSION}..."
  mkdir -p "${GLIBC_PARENT_DIR}"
  cd "${GLIBC_PARENT_DIR}"

  wget -nc "https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/glibc/glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}.tar.xz"
  tar xJf "glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION}.tar.xz"

  rm -rf "${GLIBC_BUILD_DIR}"
  mkdir -p "${GLIBC_BUILD_DIR}" "${GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR}"
  cd "${GLIBC_BUILD_DIR}"

  "${GLIBC_SRC_DIR}/configure" --prefix="${GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR}" --disable-werror
  make -j"$(nproc)"
  make install
  echo "[GLIBC] Build complete."
fi

# --- SteamCMD Setup ---
echo "[SteamCMD] Setting up..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
rm -f steamcmd.tar.gz
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
chmod +x steamcmd.sh || true
chown -R root:root /mnt || true
export HOME=/mnt/server

# --- Steam credentials ---
if [ -z "${STEAM_USER:-}" ]; then
  echo "[SteamCMD] Steam user not set, defaulting to anonymous for main install (some apps may fail)."
  STEAM_USER=anonymous
  STEAM_PASS=""
  STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

# --- Download dependencies anonymously ---
echo "[SteamCMD] Downloading MW2 runtime dependencies..."
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 1628350 validate +quit || true
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 1493710 validate +quit || true

# --- Download main MW2 app (requires user account) ---
echo "[SteamCMD] Downloading MW2 game files (AppID ${SRCDS_APPID:-10190})..."
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login "${STEAM_USER}" "${STEAM_PASS}" "${STEAM_AUTH}" \
  $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL:-0}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) \
  +app_update "${SRCDS_APPID:-10190}" ${INSTALL_FLAGS:-} validate +quit || true

# --- Steam SDK setup ---
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32 /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so 2>/dev/null || true
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so 2>/dev/null || true

# --- IW4x Launcher ---
echo "[IW4x] Downloading launcher..."
cd /mnt/server
wget -q -O iw4x-launcher-x86_64.tar.gz https://github.com/iw4x/launcher/releases/latest/download/iw4x-launcher-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz
tar xfv iw4x-launcher-x86_64.tar.gz || true
rm -f iw4x-launcher-x86_64.tar.gz
chmod +x iw4x-launcher || true

# --- Patch launcher to use local GLIBC ---
if [ -f ./iw4x-launcher ]; then
  echo "[IW4x] Patching launcher for GLIBC ${GLIBC_VERSION}..."
  patchelf --set-interpreter "${GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR}/lib/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2" \
           --add-rpath "${GLIBC_INSTALL_DIR}/lib" ./iw4x-launcher || true
fi

# --- Server Configs ---
echo "[IW4x] Fetching default server configs..."
wget -q https://github.com/iw4x/iw4-server-configs/archive/main.zip -O /tmp/iw4-server-configs-main.zip
unzip -o /tmp/iw4-server-configs-main.zip -d /mnt/server
mv -f /mnt/server/iw4-server-configs-main/* /mnt/server/ || true
rmdir /mnt/server/iw4-server-configs-main 2>/dev/null || true
rm -f /tmp/iw4-server-configs-main.zip /mnt/server/LICENSE /mnt/server/README.md || true

# --- Ensure userraw configs exist at root ---
if [ -d "/mnt/server/userraw" ]; then
  echo "[IW4x] userraw directory found. Ensuring correct placement..."
else
  echo "[IW4x] Copying missing userraw directory..."
  mkdir -p /mnt/server/userraw
  cp -r /mnt/server/iw4-server-configs-main/userraw/* /mnt/server/userraw/ 2>/dev/null || true
fi

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed successfully!"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
